Chukie Edozien (amụrụ na Nọvemba 24, 1967), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Lynxxx, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu hip-hop na onye ọchụnta ego na Naijiria

N'afọ 2010, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ This is Lynxxx wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke Pepsi zuru ụwa ọnụ kwadoro. Ọ bụ onye malitere Jollof Musik  ụdị ọ kọwara dị ka "ngwakọta egwu iji mepụta egwu dị egwu".
Lynxxx bụ naanị nwa nwoke nke Chief John D
Edozien, onye bụbu osote gọvanọ nke Bendel Steeti ochie na Naịjirịa. Ọ gara Corona Primary School Ikoyi, Lagos, wee gaa n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Kings College Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Hull na United Kingdom, ebe ọ nwetara nzere na Business, Economics na Marketing.

Mgbe afọ iri nke ọrụ n'azụ ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, Lynxxx mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu na Disemba 2009, na ntọhapụ nke egwu mbụ ya, "Change your Parade", nke Syndik8 na-emepụta ihe na onye mmekọ "IKON" mepụtara
Otu a nwetara ọtụtụ redio ma bụrụ nke a ma ama na ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị, nke nyeere Lynxxx aka ịzụlite nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya site na mgbasa ozi n'ịntanetị.
Na Disemba 2010 Lynxxx wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ This Is Lynxxx
Abọm ahụ nwere ngwakọta nke ụdị egwu, gụnyere hip hop obodo, R & B nke oge a, na ntinye nke funky house
Lynxxx na-akpọ ngwakọta a nke ụdị dị iche iche "Jollof Musik" - okwu nke na-ezo aka na nka nke ịgwakọta ụdị dị iche iche iji mee egwu dị mma
N'otu afọ ahụ, Lynxxx ghọrọ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke Pepsi kwadoro.
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ egwu ya, Lynxxx bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego

O guzobere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma tupu ọrụ egwu ya, nke gụnyere akara uwe a na-akpọ Syndik8 Denim, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ dijitalụ a na-akpọ Red Room Studio, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi a na-akpọ Happy Teddy Media (HTM), na Syndik8 Films.
